name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with a robust background in **C++23**, **Rust**, and **Go**, bringing over 13 years of experience in software development. Proficient in **Linux OS architecture**, **Linux low-level development**, and **Linux kernel development**, with hands-on expertise in **kernel tracing** and **eBPF**. Experienced in working with the **Linux networking subsystem**, as well as leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration.

Additionally, skilled in **Python** development, with a solid history of creating high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Demonstrates a strong understanding of cloud-native system deployment, microservices architecture, and CI/CD practices. Proven ability to align solutions with compliance-driven standards, bringing original strengths in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation.
